item.title: Overgrown tree blocking pavement outside no. 90, 14th June
item.description:
Tree outside no.90 really needs pruning. So many branches growing from lower on its trunk that it's very difficult for people to walk past. I reported it a few weeks ago but not sure what happened. Photo is from today.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Newlands Park, Perry Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Engine Idling, 14th June
item.description:
I would like to report a vehicle that was idling unnecessarily in the City of Westminster, in violation of anti-idling regulations. Details of the incident: • Location: 8 chesham street • Date:., 14 June 2025] • Time: [e.g., approximately 11:29am • Vehicle Description: mercedes v300d • License Plate (if known): KV20 NN0 • Description: The driver was idling the engine while stationary, claiming it was to “charge the hybrid.” When challenged, he refused to turn the engine off. As a local resident concerned about air quality, I’d appreciate it if this could be logged and enforcement considered. I’m happy to provide a photo if required. Kind regards, Nikos Bartzoulianos

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Chesham Street, Belgravia, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car. No MOT, 14th June
item.description:
Abandoned car. Been left for several weeks now in a spot we have had several cars abandoned in the past. Car has no mot. Does not belong to anyone in the street. Registration is: YG60 PJY
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakwood Drive, Barnehurst, London

item.title: Tree on pavement needs attention, 14th June
item.description:
Tree on pavement needs severe pruning or taking down. Roots are breaking up tarmac. Weed growth at base spreading. Low branches.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42,44, Cleve Road, Albany Park, Sidcup, London

item.title: Damaged tree, 14th June
item.description:
It looks like this tree was struck by lightning on Friday night at The Warren. The massive branch is now obstructing access to the top field. This access is used by the grass cutting machinery to cut grass on top field.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Broomfield Road, Bexley, London

item.title: Vegetation makes visibility dangerous when driving out of Highfield Drive, 14th June
item.description:
Overgrown vegetation makes turning right out of Highfield Dtive.dangerous ! It’s impossible in a small car to see what is coming down from St Mary’s Ave. An accident waiting to happen! Also on the pavement turning into Highfield it would be extreme difficult if you were in a mobility vehicle or pushing a double buggy! Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Cumberland Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Totally Bent Rail, 14th June
item.description:
There was a car accident that drove into these rails a few years ago and these rails are bent and have never been fixed. It's shocking to see the council has not attempted to fix this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bluebird Way, London

item.title: Tree bush, 14th June
item.description:

item.title: Uneven pavement on Waterloo Road near the Wellington Hotel, 14th June
item.description:
Something on the pavement is raised up. I’m visually impaired, so not sure if it is a manhole cover or paving stone. I’ve tripped over it a few times in the last few weeks, and fell over on Monday.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 73, Waterloo Road, Waterloo, London
Report on FixMyStreet
